item.title: 消息称 iOS 27 将专注于细节打磨
item.guid: 消息称-iOS-27-将专注于细节打磨
item.description:
iOS 26

According to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Apple's new system, to be released next year, will pay homage to Mac OS X Snow Leopard, released in 2009—making no major changes, but focusing on refining details and improving quality. 据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 报道，苹果在明年推出的新系统将会致敬其于 2009 年发布的 Mac OS X Snow Leopard——不做大的改动，而是专注于细节打磨和质量提升。

Gurman pointed out that next year's 27-series systems (such as iOS 27, etc.) will primarily focus on improving existing software. Gurman 指出， 明年的 27 系系统（如 iOS 27 等）将以改进现有软件为主。

According to him, to improve software quality, Apple's engineering team is currently conducting a comprehensive review of its operating systems, dedicated to cutting redundant features, eliminating bugs, and seeking any opportunities to significantly enhance performance and overall quality. 据其透露，为提升软件质量，苹果的工程团队现正全面检视旗下的操作系统，致力于削减冗余功能、消除错误，并寻找任何能显著提升性能和整体品质的机会。

Gurman also emphasized that the 27-series systems, like Mac OS X Snow Leopard, will lay the groundwork for future new devices (foldable iPhones and other new hardware). Gurman 还强调，27 系系统将会与 Mac OS X Snow Leopard 一样，为未来的新设备（折叠屏 iPhone 和其他新硬件）奠定基础。

And AI features will still be the main force of the upgrade—the overall upgrade next year will still revolve around AI. 而 AI 功能也依然是升级的主力军——明年整体升级依然会围绕 AI 展开。

Gurman also mentioned in the report that he believes it is unlikely for Apple CEO Tim Cook to leave in the middle of next year. Previously, the Financial Times had reported that Cook was expected to step down between late January and June next year. Gurman 还在报道中提到，其认为苹果 CEO 库克在明年年中离职的可能性不大。而此前，《金融时报》曾报道预计，库克将会在明年 1 月下旬至 6 月之间卸任。

Gurman stated that even if Cook steps down as CEO, he is very likely to continue serving as Apple's chairman because he still enjoys his current job. Gurman 表示，就算库克卸任 CEO 一职，但因为他还很喜欢目前的工作，很大可能会继续担任苹果董事长。

These poached individuals were mainly recruited into io, an AI hardware startup previously acquired by OpenAI—the company was founded by Jony Ive, Apple's former Senior Vice President of Industrial Design, and plans to launch its first AI hardware product next year. 而这些被挖走的人，主要都是被招揽进 OpenAI 此前收购的人工智能初创硬件公司 io——该公司由苹果前工业设计高级副总裁 Jony Ive 成立，计划明年推出首款 AI 硬件产品。

According to reports, Apple's former head of industrial design, Evans Hankey, and former hardware engineering executive Tang Tan have both joined the project. 据报道称，苹果前工业设计主管埃文斯・汉基（Evans Hankey）与前硬件工程高管 Tang Tan 均已加入该项目。

item.title: 20+AI 品牌齐聚广州，我在 AIDONE 见证了 AI 的100 种打开方式
item.guid: 20+AI-品牌齐聚广州，我在-AIDONE-见证了-AI-的100-种打开方式
item.description:
This weekend, APPSO, in collaboration with over 20 AI brands, successfully concluded its first 'AIDONE Offline Experience Venue' in Guangzhou. The two-day event featured three major sections: a lawn concert, immersive AI experiences, and a cross-industry thought salon, attracting a large number of tech enthusiasts. 这个周末，APPSO 联合 20 余家 AI 品牌打造的首场「AIDONE 线下体验场」在广州圆满收官。草地音乐会、沉浸式 AI 体验、跨界思想沙龙三大板块贯穿两天，吸引了大批科技爱好者到场。

In this cross-disciplinary experiment combining technology and lifestyle, major AI brands showcased their application potential in real-world scenarios. Users engaged enthusiastically on-site, with memorable scenes like robot dogs 'confronting' real dogs constantly emerging, becoming viral content on social media. Over 20 brands collectively transformed AI's 'computing power' into tangible joy for everyone. 在这场科技与生活方式的跨界实验中，各大 AI 品牌展现在真实场景中的应用潜力，用户现场互动热烈，机器狗与真狗的「对峙」等名场面不断，成为社交媒体刷屏素材，20 多个品牌合力将 AI 的「算力」变成了每个人可感知的快乐。

The concluding cross-industry salon sparked a collision of ideas about AI. Five guests—Ye Shuhua from Guangzhou Academy of Fine Arts, Liu Yubo from South China University of Technology, public welfare blogger Xiang Dongliang, algorithm expert Yu Xinhang, and Gu Mu from Ant Health—discussed the practical question of 'What should humans do in the AI era?' from five dimensions: artistic creation, urban planning, accessibility public welfare, smart transportation, and medical health. 压轴的跨界沙龙带来了一次关于 AI 的思想碰撞。广美叶淑华、华工刘宇波、公益博主项栋梁、算法专家余欣航及蚂蚁健康顾沐五位嘉宾，分别从艺术创作、城市规划、无障碍公益、智慧交通和医疗健康五个维度，探讨「AI 时代人到底要干嘛」的现实议题。

AIDONE is APPSO's first attempt to extend AI content from online to offline. By bringing together leading AI brands and products, we hope to let more people experience the practicality and fun of AI in real-world scenarios. AIDONE 是 APPSO探索 AI 内容从线上延伸至线下的首次尝试。通过聚聚头部 AI 品牌和产品，我们希望让更多人在真实场景中感受 AI 的实用与乐趣。

item.title: 小米回应「汽车工厂内电池产线起火」
item.guid: 小米回应「汽车工厂内电池产线起火」
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi officially posted a statement to explicitly refute the online rumor about 'a battery production line catching fire inside the Xiaomi car factory'. 昨天，小米官方发文就网传「小米汽车工厂内电池产线起火」消息明确辟谣。

The official account 'Xiaomi Company Spokesperson' pointed out that the incident was actually an operational deviation during equipment debugging in the factory's battery workshop in 2024, not a battery design or manufacturing defect. 官方账号「小米公司发言人」指出， 该事件实为 2024 年工厂电池车间设备调试过程中出现的操作偏差，并非电池设计或制造缺陷。

Xiaomi stated that during debugging, an operator made an error in manual mode, causing the battery pack transported by an AGV (Automated Guided Vehicle) to collide with equipment. The damaged cell then short-circuited, igniting a small flame. The fire was very small, and the workshop quickly activated emergency procedures and extinguished it. It did not spread to other production areas and caused no personal injury. 小米表示，调试期间操作人员在手动模式下误操作，导致 AGV（自动导引车）托运的电池包与设备发生磕碰，电芯受损后短路引发明火。火情规模极小，车间迅速启动应急预案并扑灭，未波及其他生产区域，也未造成人员伤害。

Xiaomi emphasized that the battery packs for its models, including the Xiaomi SU7 and Xiaomi YU7, are all developed according to ultra-high standards and comply with relevant national standards. 小米方面强调，旗下车型电池包均按照超高标准开发，包括小米 SU7 与小米 YU7，均符合国家相关标准。

At the same time, Xiaomi also clarified that the so-called 'event wall display' images circulating online were actually management dashboards from the initial equipment debugging phase in early 2024, and all related issues were resolved before mass production. 同时，小米还澄清，网络流传的所谓「事件墙展示」图片，实为 2024 年初设备最初调试阶段的管理看板，相关问题在量产前已全部解决。

item.title: 马斯克：特斯拉已部署超百万颗 AI 芯片
item.guid: 马斯克：特斯拉已部署超百万颗-AI-芯片
item.description:
Yesterday, Tesla CEO Elon Musk posted a pinned message on social media platform X, systematically introducing the latest progress and strategic goals of the company's self-developed AI chip team. 昨天，特斯拉 CEO 埃隆・马斯克在社交平台 X 上发布置顶消息，系统性介绍了公司自研 AI 芯片团队的最新进展与战略目标。

Musk stated that the public generally underestimates the scale of Tesla's investment in chip design, and the company has had an 'advanced AI chip and circuit board engineering team' for many years. 马斯克表示，外界普遍不了解特斯拉在芯片设计上的投入规模，公司多年来一直拥有「先进的 AI 芯片与电路板工程团队」。

Currently, Tesla has deployed millions of self-developed AI chips in vehicles and data centers . These chips support autonomous driving and data processing, and he emphasized that it is these chips that 'make Tesla a leader in real-world AI'. 目前， 特斯拉已在车辆与数据中心部署数百万颗自研 AI 芯片 ，这些芯片为自动驾驶与数据处理提供支持，他强调正是这些芯片「让特斯拉成为现实世界 AI 的领导者」。

Regarding technological iteration, Musk stated that the current version used in Tesla vehicles is AI4, the next generation AI5 is close to tape-out, and AI6 development has also begun. At the same time, Musk set a clear goal: 在技术迭代方面，马斯克表示特斯拉车端现用版本为 AI4，下一代 AI5 已接近流片阶段，AI6 研发也已启动。同时，马斯克提出明确目标：

To launch a new AI chip and complete mass production every 12 months. He further emphasized that the company expects future chip production to 'eventually exceed the sum of all other AI chips,' and stressed that 'this is not a joke'.

In terms of application scenarios, Musk pointed out that self-developed chips will bring 'profound positive impacts,' including a safer driving experience to 'save millions of lives,' and the application of the humanoid robot Optimus in the medical field to provide 'advanced medical services' to the public. 应用场景方面，马斯克指出，自研芯片将带来「深远的积极影响」，包括更安全的驾驶体验以「挽救数百万生命」，以及通过人形机器人擎天柱 Optimus 在医学领域的应用，为大众提供「先进医疗服务」。

Additionally, Tesla is actively recruiting chip-related talent, requiring applicants to demonstrate their 'excellent capabilities' with three key points, and particularly focusing on the application of cutting-edge AI in chip design. 此外，特斯拉正在积极招聘芯片相关人才，要求应聘者以三条要点证明自身「卓越能力」，并特别关注在芯片设计中应用前沿 AI 的方向。

item.title: 俞敏洪再发全员信致歉
item.guid: 俞敏洪再发全员信致歉
item.description:
According to information from multiple sources, Yu Minhong, founder of New Oriental, issued an all-staff letter yesterday titled 'Let's Work Together,' apologizing again for the controversy sparked by a previous internal letter related to Antarctica. 据多方信息获悉，新东方创始人俞敏洪昨日发布主题为「让我们一起努力」的全员信，就此前南极相关内部信引发的争议再次致歉。

He explained in the letter that his original intention in using descriptions and metaphors of Antarctica when writing the letter was sincere sharing, not showing off, and emphasized that 'a boss willing to share with everyone is always more reassuring and comforting to employees than a mysterious boss.' 他在信中解释，写信时使用南极的描述与比喻， 初衷是真诚分享而非炫耀，并强调「一个愿意和大家分享的老板，总比一个神秘的老板更加让员工放心和安心」。

Yu Minhong also responded to the accusation of 'traveling with employees' hard-earned money,' deeming the statement inappropriate. He pointed out that employees and management have a mutually beneficial, two-way cooperative relationship, with both parties making efforts and taking risks in their respective positions to ensure the company's normal development and job security. 俞敏洪同时回应了「用员工血汗钱旅游」的质疑，认为这种说法不妥。他指出， 员工与管理层是互相成就的双向合作关系，双方均在各自岗位付出努力并承担风险，以确保公司正常发展和工作保障。

He admitted that his trip to Antarctica did have a personal travel component, but the core purpose was to accept Xi Zhinong's invitation to discuss youth nature exploration education and meet several experts in related fields, with the potential to introduce them to New Oriental in the future. 他承认此次南极之行确有个人旅游成分，但核心目的是受奚志农邀请，探讨青少年自然探索教育，并结识多位相关领域专家，未来有望引入新东方。

In the letter, Yu Minhong also explained the dissatisfaction caused by the use of red font, stating that the older generation's perception of red is 'festive' and has no other meaning. He emphasized that the company encourages employees to report unfair treatment through internal channels or his personal email, and also called on employees to jointly maintain the company's development and image. 在信中，俞敏洪还就使用红色字体引发不满进行解释，称老一代人对红色的认知是「喜庆」，并无其他含义。他强调，公司鼓励员工通过内部渠道或其个人邮箱反馈不公待遇，同时呼吁员工共同维护公司发展与形象。

He warned that 'extreme remarks published on self-media should be considered carefully,' and reiterated that New Oriental encourages freedom of speech, but on the premise of the company's normal development. 他提醒「那种发表到自媒体上的极端言论，最好慎重一下」，并重申新东方鼓励言论自由，但前提是公司正常发展。

item.title: 美团将在全国建设「骑手公寓」
item.guid: 美团将在全国建设「骑手公寓」
item.description:
Recently, Meituan announced that it will build 'rider apartments' nationwide and provide rental subsidies for riders with housing needs, aiming to reduce riders' living costs, improve commuting convenience, and enhance quality of life. 近日，美团宣布将在全国范围内建设「骑手公寓」，并为有住房需求的骑手提供租房补贴，旨在降低骑手居住成本，提升通勤便利性和生活质量。

According to reports, in the first batch of apartments near Beijing's Temple of Heaven, riders can rent a single room for 700 yuan per month, while market rents in the same area are generally above 1500 yuan. 据介绍，在北京天坛附近的首批公寓中， 骑手可用 700 元月租入住单间，而同区域市场租金普遍在 1500 元以上。

Meituan stated that all apartments are equipped with eco-friendly fine decoration, home appliances, and internet, and a dedicated team provides cleaning and maintenance services, ensuring riders can 'move in with just a bag.' 美团表示，所有公寓均配备环保精装、家电与网络，并由专门团队提供保洁和维修服务，确保骑手「拎包入住」。

The first batch of projects has been launched in Beijing, Shenzhen, Chongqing, and other cities, with an estimated 600 riders to move in. Apartment types cover single rooms, shared rooms, and family rooms, offering facilities such as independent shower rooms, washing machines, water dispensers, and 24-hour hot water. 首批项目已在北京、深圳和重庆等地启动，预计有 600 名骑手入住。公寓房型涵盖单人间、多人间及家庭房，提供独立淋浴房、洗衣机、饮水机和 24 小时热水等设施。

In addition, Meituan will cover the initial utility costs (water, electricity, heating) and internet fees, and regularly organize public welfare activities such as 'welcome parties,' 'rider加油站 (refueling stations),' and 'birthday parties' within the apartments. 此外，美团还将承担首批水电暖及网络费用，并在公寓内定期组织「欢迎会」「骑手加油站」「生日会」等公益活动。

It is reported that this initiative is being advanced in conjunction with the fifth anniversary of Meituan's 'Tongzhou Plan.' The 'Tongzhou Plan,' launched in 2020, has invested a cumulative 2 billion yuan, covering benefits such as critical illness care for riders, family assistance, and 'rider-friendly communities.' 据悉，该举措与美团「同舟计划」五周年同步推进。「同舟计划」自 2020 年启动，累计投入 20 亿元，覆盖骑手大病关怀、家庭帮扶及「骑手友好社区」等福利。

Meituan revealed that it will continue to increase investment over the next five years, with a total estimated at 10 billion yuan, to build a rider welfare model of 'basic protection + advanced protection + living benefits.' 美团透露，未来五年将继续加大投入，总额预计达 100 亿元，构建「基础保障+进阶保障+生活福利」的骑手福利模式。

item.title: 蔚来萤火虫国内达 3 万台交付
item.guid: 蔚来萤火虫国内达-3-万台交付
item.description:
NIO CEO William Li announced at the recent 2025 Guangzhou Auto Show that its pure electric compact car, the firefly, has achieved cumulative deliveries of over 30,000 units in China. 蔚来汽车 CEO 李斌在日前的 2025 广州车展上宣布，旗下纯电小车 firefly「萤火虫」已在国内累计交付突破 3 万台。

The model was officially launched on April 19 this year, with an official guide price of 119,800 to 125,800 yuan, and completed its 20,000th delivery on September 27. 该车型于今年 4 月 19 日正式上市，官方指导价为 11.98 ~ 12.58 万元，并在 9 月 27 日完成第 2 万台交付。

Meanwhile, NIO announced that the right-hand drive version of the Firefly is ready and will soon enter the Singaporean and Thai markets. 同时， 蔚来宣布萤火虫的右舵版本已完成准备，即将进入新加坡和泰国市场。

Currently, the car has entered European markets such as the Netherlands, Norway, Belgium, Denmark, Greece, Austria, and Portugal, and plans to expand to a total of 17 countries in Europe, America, and Southeast Asia in the future. 目前，该车已进入荷兰、挪威、比利时、丹麦、希腊、奥地利、葡萄牙等欧洲国家市场，并计划在未来拓展至欧美及东南亚共 17 个国家。

In terms of specifications, the Firefly has a body length of 4003 mm, width of 1781 mm, height of 1557 mm, and a wheelbase of 2615 mm. It is equipped with a 42 kWh battery, offering a CLTC comprehensive range of 420 km, powered by a 105 kW permanent magnet synchronous motor (rear-wheel drive), with a maximum output torque of 200 N·m and a top speed of 150 km/h. 规格方面，萤火虫车身尺寸为长 4003 毫米、宽 1781 毫米、高 1557 毫米，轴距 2615 毫米。配备 42 kWh 电池，CLTC 综合续航里程为 420 公里，搭载 105 kW 永磁同步电机（后驱），最大输出扭矩 200 N・m，最高车速 150 km/h。

item.title: Google 否认使用 Gmail 用户的邮件训练 AI 模型
item.guid: Google-否认使用-Gmail-用户的邮件训练-AI-模型
item.description:
According to The Verge, Google has denied 'misleading' reports about Gmail using user emails to train AI. 据 The Verge 报道，Google 否认了关于 Gmail 使用用户邮件训练 AI 的「误导性」报道。

It is reported that there were recent claims that Google changed its AI feature usage policy and would use users' Gmail emails and attachments to train AI models, with the only opt-out method being to disable 'smart features' such as spell check. 据悉，日前有消息称 Google 更改了 AI 功能使用政策，并将使用用户的 Gmail 邮件和附件来训练人工智能模型，而唯一的选择退出方式是禁用「智能功能」，如拼写检查。

In response to the above situation, company spokesperson Jenny Thomson replied through reports: 针对上述情况，公司发言人 Jenny Thomson 通过报道回应：

Google's AI product training data comes from public information, licensed content, and data users choose to share, and Gmail emails are not among them. The company also emphasized that its privacy policy and user data protection measures remain unchanged.

Previously, some media reported that Gmail emails might be used for model training, raising user privacy concerns, and this incident sparked widespread discussion on social platforms. 此前，有媒体称 Gmail 邮件可能被用于模型训练，引发用户对隐私的担忧，此事件在社交平台引发广泛讨论。

item.title: 视觉中国发布道歉声明：系第三方盗图上传
item.guid: 视觉中国发布道歉声明：系第三方盗图上传
item.description:
Recently, the two-year-long copyright infringement case brought by photographer Dai Jianfeng against Visual China received its first-instance judgment. 近日，历时两年的摄影师戴建峰起诉视觉中国侵权案迎来一审判决。

The Heping District People's Court of Tianjin City ruled that Visual China infringed Dai Jianfeng's right of authorship and right of information network dissemination by unauthorized sale of his work "Village Under the Milky Way", ordering Visual China and its affiliated companies to jointly compensate 15,000 yuan, and to publish a statement on its official website homepage for 48 consecutive hours to eliminate the impact. 天津市和平区人民法院认定 视觉中国未经授权销售戴建峰作品《银河下的村庄》，侵犯其署名权与信息网络传播权，判令视觉中国及关联公司连带赔偿 1.5 万元，并在官网首页连续 48 小时刊登声明以消除影响。

The court ruling pointed out that Visual China had previously acquired and sold the work in question through a third party, Zhou, for a contract price of 2,400 yuan, but falsely claimed to own the copyright externally. 法院判决指出，视觉中国此前通过第三方周某获取并销售涉案作品，合同价格为 2400 元，但其对外谎称拥有著作权。

Furthermore, Visual China had previously counter-claimed over 80,000 yuan from Dai Jianfeng in 2023, which the court deemed clearly improper and lacking necessary due diligence. Aside from the work in question, the court rejected Dai Jianfeng's claims that Visual China's sale of the remaining 148 works constituted infringement. 此外，视觉中国在 2023 年曾反向向戴建峰索赔 8 万余元，法院认定该行为明显不当，缺乏必要的审查义务。除涉案作品外，法院驳回了戴建峰关于视觉中国销售其余 148 幅作品构成侵权的诉求。

On the 22nd, Visual China issued an apology statement on its official website, stating that the work in question was uploaded by a contributor who misappropriated it, and that the company indeed infringed Dai Jianfeng's copyright during the display and sale process. 22 日，视觉中国在官网发布致歉声明，称涉案作品系供稿人盗用上传，公司在展示及销售过程中确实侵害了戴建峰的著作权。

Visual China stated that the images involved in the case have been removed during the litigation period, and the accounts of relevant contributors have been permanently banned. The company will also improve its content review process and strengthen copyright protection. 视觉中国表示，涉案图片已在诉讼期间下架，并永久封禁相关供稿人账号，同时将完善内容审核流程，加强版权保护。

item.title: Meta 被曝为求增长而不择手段
item.guid: Meta-被曝为求增长而不择手段
item.description:
According to Time magazine, Meta is once again embroiled in a public controversy. Recently disclosed court documents from the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California reveal that the company has seriously failed in protecting minors and has long concealed platform risks. 据《时代》报道，Meta 再次陷入舆论漩涡。美国加利福尼亚北区联邦法院近日公开的诉讼文件显示，该公司在未成年人保护方面存在严重失职，并长期隐瞒平台风险。

Over 1,800 plaintiffs, including minors, parents, school districts, and state attorneys general, have jointly sued social platforms such as Meta, Snapchat, and YouTube, accusing them of "recklessly pursuing growth, disregarding the harm their products cause to children's physical and mental health." Key allegations include: 超过 1800 名原告，包括未成年人、家长、学区及州检察长，联合起诉 Meta、Snapchat 与 YouTube 等社交平台，指控其「不计后果地追求增长，无视产品对儿童身心健康的危害」。核心指控包括：

    High tolerance violation policy: Testimony from a former Instagram head of safety revealed that accounts involved in sex trafficking required 16 violations before being banned, with action taken only on the 17th violation, a standard far exceeding industry norms;

    Concealing research findings: Internal research in 2019 found that users experienced significant relief from anxiety and depression after deactivating Facebook and Instagram for a week, but the company terminated the research and denied any correlation during a 2020 congressional inquiry;

    Allowing strangers to contact minors: Internal documents showed that teen accounts did not have default privacy settings, leading to up to 5.4 million inappropriate interactions daily. Privacy protection was not fully implemented until 2024;

    Deliberately attracting younger users: Since 2017, Meta has made acquiring teen users a core objective. By 2015, Instagram already had 4 million users under 13, and a 2018 survey showed nearly 40% of 9-12 year olds used the platform daily;

    Shelving safety improvements: Measures such as hiding likes and disabling beauty filters were canceled or postponed due to their impact on ad revenue and growth;

    Self-harm and addiction issues: Internal investigations showed that over 8% of 13-15 year old users witnessed self-harm or suicide threats within a week. A 2018 study found that 58% of users exhibited "problematic use," but public reports only mentioned 3.1% of heavy users.

A Meta spokesperson responded that the allegations were "taken out of context and misleading to the public," emphasizing that the company has continuously launched youth protection features for a decade, including the "Instagram Teen Accounts" privacy settings and parental supervision tools launched in 2024. Meta 发言人回应称，相关指控「断章取义、误导公众」，并强调公司十年来持续推出青少年保护功能，包括 2024 年上线的「Instagram 青少年账户」隐私设置与家长监管工具。

However, the plaintiffs' lawyers pointed out that Meta's strategy is identical to that of tobacco companies luring teenagers into addiction, highlighting its long-standing conflict between business interests and user safety. 然而，原告律师指出，Meta 的策略与烟草公司引诱青少年成瘾如出一辙，凸显其在商业利益与用户安全之间的长期冲突。

item.title: 💡 苏妈：我也不担心 AI 泡沫
item.guid: 💡-苏妈：我也不担心-AI-泡沫
item.description:
According to The Wall Street Journal, AMD CEO Lisa Su recently stated in an interview that she is not concerned about the so-called "AI bubble," emphasizing that "under-investing is more dangerous than over-investing." 据《华尔街日报》报道，AMD CEO 苏姿丰近日在接受采访时明确表示，她并不担心所谓的「AI 泡沫」，并强调「投资不足比投资过多更危险」。

Against the backdrop of continuously rising demand for AI computing power, Lisa Su is leading AMD's full pivot to AI chip business, striving to capture market share in a market dominated by Nvidia. 在人工智能算力需求持续攀升的背景下，苏姿丰正带领 AMD 全面转向 AI 芯片业务，力图在由英伟达主导的市场中抢占份额。

Lisa Su pointed out that AI is a 'once-in-a-lifetime opportunity,' and AMD must place AI at the core of its product line. Over the past three years, the company's market capitalization has grown from $90 billion to over $335 billion, and although its stock price has recently corrected, its strategy in the data center and AI chip markets has begun to show results. 苏姿丰指出，人工智能是一次「千载难逢的机会」，AMD 必须将 AI 置于产品线核心。过去三年，公司市值已从 900 亿美元增长至超过 3350 亿美元，尽管近期股价有所回调，但其在数据中心和 AI 芯片市场的布局已初见成效。

She revealed that AMD's latest generation MI450 chip has received large-scale orders from OpenAI and Oracle, and is planned for official launch next year. 她透露，AMD 最新一代 MI450 芯片已获得 OpenAI 与甲骨文的大规模订单，并计划在明年正式推出。

Regarding financing arrangements, to ensure cooperation with OpenAI, AMD even pledged warrants, allowing the latter to purchase up to 10% of AMD's shares at a discounted price. 在融资安排方面，AMD 为确保与 OpenAI 达成合作，甚至承诺认股权证，使后者能以折扣价购买 AMD 高达 10% 的股份。

Such transactions have raised external concerns about whether the AI boom is supported by unsustainable financing. However, Lisa Su emphasized that the current stage 'is not the time to stand by and worry about over-investment,' believing that excessive caution could instead lead to missing industry opportunities. 这类交易引发外界对 AI 热潮是否由不可持续融资支撑的担忧。然而，苏姿丰强调，当前阶段「不是站在一旁担心是否投资过多的时候」，她认为过度谨慎反而可能错失行业机遇。

Facing Nvidia's dominant position, Lisa Su stated that AMD will enter the market with price advantages and diversified partnerships. 而面对英伟达的强势地位，苏姿丰表示，AMD 将凭借价格优势和多样化合作伙伴关系切入市场。

She predicted that by 2030, the AI and data center market size will reach $1 trillion annually, and AMD's revenue in this sector will maintain an average annual growth of 80%, achieving a double-digit market share within the next three to five years. 她预测，到 2030 年，AI 与数据中心市场规模将达到每年 1 万亿美元，AMD 在该领域的营收将保持年均 80% 的增长，并在未来三至五年实现双位数市场份额。

Interestingly, last week Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang also expressed similar views during the earnings call: 有趣的是， 上周英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋也曾在财报电话会上表达了相似的观点：

There are many claims about an AI bubble, but from our perspective, the situation is completely different (compared to the dot-com bubble era). AI is transforming existing workloads, and we do not see the existence of an AI bubble.

item.title: 一加 Ace 6T 真机今日公布
item.guid: 一加-Ace-6T-真机今日公布
item.description:
Yesterday, Li Jie, President of OnePlus China, announced several highlights of the new OnePlus Ace 6T, and previewed that real device information would be released today. 昨天，一加中国区总裁李杰公布了一加 Ace 6T 新机的多项亮点，并预告将在今日公布真机信息。

According to his introduction, the new phone will be positioned as a 'new choice for performance flagships,' and will globally debut Qualcomm's fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 processor, feature a battery capacity of over 8000mAh, and be equipped with 100W flash charging; it will incorporate the new generation 'Wind-Chasing Game Kernel,' supporting 165Hz ultra-high frame rate gaming. 据其介绍，新机将定位「性能旗舰新选择」，并全球首发高通第五代骁龙 8 处理器，电池容量达到 8000mAh 以上，配备 100W 闪充；写入新一代「风驰游戏内核」，支持 165Hz 超高帧游戏。

The OnePlus Ace 6T will also support 3D ultrasonic fingerprint recognition, come standard with IP66/68/69/69K full-level dust and water resistance, a new 'Glacier Cooling System,' and bypass power supply. Additionally, the new phone will offer a Genshin Impact Kamisato Ayaka customized version. 一加 Ace 6T 还将支持 3D 超声波指纹，标配 IP66/68/69/69K 满级防尘防水、全新「冰河散热系统」、旁路供电。另外新机还将提供原神神里绫华定制版本。

item.title: 家庭机器人也能很可爱，Memo 亮相
item.guid: 家庭机器人也能很可爱，Memo-亮相
item.description:
Sunday Robotics recently unveiled its new home robot, Memo, which can autonomously perform household chores such as making coffee, clearing the dining table, and loading the dishwasher in an open-plan kitchen. Sunday Robotics 最近公开其新款家庭机器人 Memo，该机器人能够在开放式厨房中自主完成制作咖啡、清理餐桌以及装载洗碗机等家务。

Memo's appearance resembles the character Wall-E from the movie, with a sleek white torso, a cartoonish face, and a red baseball cap; it doesn't use legs like common humanoid robots, but rather moves via a wheeled platform and adjusts its height by sliding a central column up and down. Memo 的外形酷似电影《Wall-E》中的角色，拥有光洁的白色躯干、卡通化的面部以及一顶红色的棒球帽；它并非像常见人形机器人那样使用双腿，而是通过一个轮式平台移动，并利用中心立柱上下滑动来调节高度。

In practical demonstrations, Memo displayed surprising operational details. It can not only complete the steps of filling, tamping, and starting an espresso machine, but also demonstrate extremely high skill when clearing the table, simultaneously grasping two glass cups with one hand – pinching one with its thumb and index finger, and holding the other with the rest of its palm. 在实际演示中，Memo 展现了令人惊讶的操作细节。它不仅能按步骤完成填粉、压粉并启动浓缩咖啡机，还能在清理餐桌时展示出极高的技巧，单手同时抓取两只玻璃杯，即用拇指和食指夹住一只，再用手掌其余部分握住另一只。

Unlike the previously popular 1x humanoid robots that perform household chores, Memo does not rely on manual remote control, but instead learns and trains all tasks using a pair of gloves. 和此前大热的 1x 做家务人形机器人不同，Memo 不依靠人工的远程控制，而是凭借着一双手套学习和训练所有的任务。

Sunday's new approach is that during training (human-powered), they don't directly remote control the robot. Instead, they pay ordinary people to wear special 'Skill Capture Gloves' to perform household chores (such as washing dishes, folding socks). Sunday 的新办法是，训练时（靠人），他们不直接遥控机器人。相反，他们付钱给普通人，让他们戴上特制的「技能捕捉手套（Skill Capture Glove）」去做家务（比如洗碗、叠袜子）。

During operation (AI-powered), this data is fed into a large model called ACT-1. Once training is complete, the Memo robot operates completely autonomously in the user's home, requiring no remote control from anyone. 运行时（靠 AI），这些数据被喂给一个叫 ACT-1 的大模型。一旦训练完成，机器人 Memo 在用户家里干活时，是完全自主的，不需要任何人远程遥控它 。

Currently, Memo is still in beta testing. Invited users can take it home for free, while also helping Memo learn more household scenarios and collect training data. 目前，Memo 还在 beta 测试阶段，受邀请的用户可以免费把它带回家，同时帮助 Memo 学习更多的家用场景，收集训练数据。

item.title: 三星首款三折叠即将上市
item.guid: 三星首款三折叠即将上市
item.description:
According to information from multiple sources, Samsung's first triple-folding smartphone is expected to be released next month. Samsung's offline authorized stores have already started taking reservations, and pricing information has not yet been announced. 据多方信息获悉，三星首款三折折叠智能手机预计将于下月发布，三星线下授权门店已经开启预约，价格信息暂未公布。

Previously, blogger Evan Blass revealed that Samsung's upcoming tri-fold new phone will be named "Galaxy Z TriFold". It will feature a 6.5-inch external screen, expanding to a 10-inch internal screen, with peak brightness levels of 2600nits and 1600nits respectively. 此前，博主Evan Blass 曾透露，三星即将发布的三折叠新机将命名为「Galaxy Z TriFold」，其配备一块 6.5 英寸外屏，展开为 10 英寸内屏，峰值亮度分别为 2600nits 和 1600nits。

He also stated that the Galaxy Z TriFold's body thickness is not uniform, with the three folded sections having thicknesses of 3.9mm, 4.0mm, and 4.2mm respectively, and the overall device thickness being 14mm. 其还表示，Galaxy Z TriFold 机身厚度并不均匀，其三段折叠区域厚度分别为 3.9mm、4.0mm 和 4.2mm，整机厚度为 14mm。

In other aspects, the new phone is equipped with a 200-megapixel main camera, has a 5600mAh battery, and supports 45W wired fast charging. 其他方面，新机配备一枚 2 亿像素主摄，拥有 5600mAh 电池，支持 45W 有线快充。

item.title: 法拉利博物馆有望落户北京
item.guid: 法拉利博物馆有望落户北京
item.description:
According to Beijing Daily, on November 21st, the Beijing Urban Sub-center Cultural Tourism Zone held an investment promotion conference. Four key projects, including the Mars Habitat Sci-Fi City and the Ferrari World Entertainment Complex, were successfully signed, with a total investment of nearly 10 billion yuan: 据北京发布消息，11 月 21 日，北京城市副中心文化旅游区举行招商推介会，火星人居科幻城、法拉利世界娱乐综合体等四个重点项目成功签约，总投资额近百亿元：

    The Ferrari World Entertainment Complex is an exhilarating experience project where speed and passion intertwine, and heartbeats resonate with engines. It includes various formats such as the world's fastest Formula Rossa roller coaster, an e-sports park, a Ferrari museum, and a Ferrari club. Upon completion, it will become Asia's first Ferrari World Entertainment Complex, with an estimated annual visitor flow of 1.8 million.

    The Mars Habitat Sci-Fi City project is the first Mars-themed immersive experience base in China, integrating Martian cultural creativity, aerospace science education, immersive science interaction, and space entertainment experiences. Construction is planned to start early next year, with an estimated opening by the end of 2028.

    The three parties involved in the implementation, investment, and cooperative operation of the "Flight to Sagittarius - Sailing Camp" have reached a strategic cooperation, and the Cultural Tourism Zone Digital Intelligence Platform project was signed simultaneously.

Since the beginning of this year, the Cultural Tourism Zone has seen a flurry of new developments: the headquarters of ShouLv Group has moved in, the Urban Sports Center has successfully acquired land, the North Ring Transportation Hub has begun trial operations, three high-end brand hotels have officially opened, and "Wanli" is scheduled to debut at the end of the year. 今年以来，文化旅游区密集「上新」，首旅集团总部入驻办公，城市运动中心成功摘地，环北交通枢纽试运营，3 家高端品牌酒店正式营业，「湾里」定档年底亮相。

Wang Yue, Director of the Industry Promotion Department of the Urban Sub-center Party Working Committee and Management Committee, stated that this is not just about the opening of a few hotels or commercial complexes, but rather the construction of a cultural tourism ecosystem that offers "fun during the day, lingering at night, and excitement for multiple days." A cultural tourism zone with complete and rich holiday functions has initially taken shape. 城市副中心党工委管委会产业促进处处长王玥表示，这不仅仅是几个酒店或商业体的开业，而是构建了一个「白天畅玩、夜晚流连、多日精彩」的文旅生态系统。一个具备完整丰富度假功能的文旅区已初步成型。

Next, the Sub-center Cultural Tourism Zone will also promote the navigation of the Xiaotaihou River, forming a vibrant waterfront corridor connecting "Taihu Performing Arts Town—Universal Beijing Resort—Zhangjiawan Ancient Town—Grand Canal". 接下来，副中心文旅区还将推动萧太后河通航，形成「台湖演艺小镇—北京环球影城—张家湾古镇—大运河」的滨水活力走廊。

item.title: 紫龙游戏回应「实习生出差抽中显卡要上交」
item.guid: 紫龙游戏回应「实习生出差抽中显卡要上交」
item.description:
Recently, a topic about "a young man winning a big prize on a business trip, and the company demanding he hand it over" sparked heated discussion on social media platforms like Weibo, Xiaohongshu, and Douyin. 日前，一则关于「小伙出差时抽中大奖公司要求上交」的话题在微博、小红书、抖音等网络平台引发热议。

According to reports from National Business Daily, Li Hua (pseudonym), an intern at a company in Shanghai, posted on social media that he was on a business trip and participated in a stamp collection lucky draw at an event, unexpectedly winning a GeForce RTX 5060 graphics card worth approximately 3000 yuan. However, a company colleague accompanying him informed him that "the graphics card belongs to company property, finance is already aware, and it needs to be handed over." 据每日经济新闻报道，上海某公司的一名实习生李华（化名）在社交平台发帖称，自己因公出差，在活动现场参与集章抽奖，意外抽中了一张价值约 3000 元的 GeForce RTX 5060 显卡。然而，随行的公司同事便告知他「显卡属于公司财产，财务已经知道了，需要上交」。

According to Yangtse Evening Post, on November 20th, Li Hua told reporters that after multiple rounds of "discussions" with the company, although the company ultimately stopped forcibly demanding the graphics card, they also hinted that he should "seek other opportunities." He has since submitted his resignation. 而据扬子晚报，11 月 20 日，李华告诉记者，在与公司多轮「约谈」后，虽然公司最终不再强行索要显卡，但也暗示他「另谋高就」。其也已提交了离职申请。

As the relevant posts spread online, some netizens linked the incident to the well-known gaming company Zilong Game. 随着相关帖子在网络发酵，有部分网友将该事件与知名游戏公司紫龙游戏相关联。

On November 22nd, Tianjin Zilong Singularity Interactive Entertainment Co., Ltd. and Shanghai Zili Information Technology Co., Ltd., both under Zilong Game, jointly issued an official clarification announcement, explicitly stating that this incident has no connection whatsoever with the company or its employees. 11 月 22 日，紫龙游戏旗下天津紫龙奇点互动娱乐有限公司与上海紫骊信息技术有限公司联合发布官方澄清公告， 明确指出该事件与本公司及全体员工无任何关联。

In the announcement, Zilong Game solemnly declared after verification: All companies within the group did not participate in the relevant exhibition, therefore the online rumor of the lucky draw incident has "no legal or factual connection with Shanghai Zilong Game Company, Zilong Game, or its employees." 公告中，紫龙游戏经核查后郑重声明：集团内所有公司均未参加相关展会，因此网传的抽奖事件与「上海紫龙游戏公司、紫龙游戏及员工无任何法律关联、事实关联」。

Zilong Game stated in the announcement that the spread of false information has caused substantial negative impact on the company. During this period, a large number of netizens, due to misunderstanding, made groundless accusations and malicious comments against the company, with some remarks constituting defamation; at the same time, the company's recruitment website was maliciously attacked, severely disrupting the normal recruitment order. 紫龙游戏在公告中表示，不实信息的传播已对公司造成实质性负面影响。在此期间，大量网友因误解对公司进行无端指责与恶意评论，部分言论构成名誉侵权；同时，公司招聘网站也遭到恶意围攻，严重干扰了正常招聘秩序。

item.title: 高中毕业生伪造履历当上博导，江苏科技大学通报
item.guid: 高中毕业生伪造履历当上博导，江苏科技大学通报
item.description:
According to CCTV News, Jiangsu University of Science and Technology recently announced that Guo Wei, the school's "chief scientist," is actually an academic fraudster. 据央视新闻报道，江苏科技大学近日通报，学校「首席科学家」郭伟其实是个学术骗子。

According to the official Weibo account of "Jiangsu University of Science and Technology," in September 2025, the university received a report alleging academic misconduct by a teacher named Guo. The university attached great importance to this and immediately initiated an investigation. After investigation and evidence collection, it was determined that Guo had engaged in serious academic misconduct. The employment agreement with Guo has been terminated in accordance with regulations, and appropriate arrangements have been made for his team's faculty and students. Concurrently, the university reported the case to the public security organs immediately, and the case is currently under investigation. 据「江苏科技大学」官方微博消息，2025 年 9 月，学校收到教师郭某涉嫌学术不端的举报，对此高度重视，立即启动调查程序。经调查取证，认定郭某存在严重学术不端行为，已经按规定解除了与郭某的聘用协议，并对其团队师生进行了妥善安排。同时，学校第一时间向公安机关报案，目前案件正在侦办过程中。

It is reported that Guo Wei, using fabricated impressive titles and achievements such as "Shaanxi Gaokao Top Scorer," "Senior Researcher at the German National Academy of Sciences," "National Science and Technology Progress Award Winner," and "Published over 170 SCI papers," successfully entered Jiangsu University of Science and Technology in 2023, became a doctoral supervisor, and formed a team to conduct so-called nanomaterial research. 据悉，郭伟凭借「陕西高考状元」「德国国家科学院高级研究员」「国家科学技术进步奖得主」「发表 170 余篇 SCI 论文」等伪造的唬人头衔和成就，于 2023 年成功进入江苏科技大学，并成为博士身份导师，组建团队进行所谓纳米材料研究。

item.title: 华纳探索收购最新进度：多家巨头正式参与竞标
item.guid: 华纳探索收购最新进度：多家巨头正式参与竞标
item.description:
According to The Hollywood Reporter and Deadline, a recent Warner Bros. bidding war, another major upheaval in Hollywood, has officially begun: Paramount, Comcast, and Netflix have formally joined the bidding, offering to acquire all or part of Warner Bros. Discovery. 据守望好莱坞和 Deadline 报道，近期华纳争夺战、好莱坞又一剧变正经拉开帷幕了：派拉蒙、Comcast、Netflix 正式参与竞标，出价求全部/部分收购华纳兄弟探索。

Deadline reports that multiple sources have confirmed the bids from these three companies. It states that the non-binding offers for this deal close this Thursday, after which there will be another round, where bidders will be asked if they wish to submit a final binding offer after detailed discussions. Dealine 报道称，多个消息源证实了这三家出价一事。称此交易的非约束性报价截止于本周四，此后还会有一轮，即在讨论确定详细之后，会询问投标者是否要提交最终的约束性报价。

Warner Bros. had previously hinted that they believe this deal would have a result by late December this year, i.e., by year-end. Following this, there will be regulatory approval processes, which are expected to take at least a year. 华纳方此前暗示他们相信此交易会在今年 12 月下旬也就是年底有一个结果。此后还有监管者批准等流程，预计要花至少一年。

It is worth noting that Paramount, which was just acquired by Skydance, has been the most active in this matter, seeking to acquire the entire Warner Bros. Discovery, including its struggling television networks; Netflix and Comcast are interested in Warner's film studio and streaming divisions. 值得一提的是，刚被天舞收购的派拉蒙在此事中一直最为积极，他们求购的是整个华纳兄弟探索，包括处境挣扎的电视网等；Netflix 和 Comcast 想要的是华纳的电影公司、流媒体部分。

item.title: 《哪吒 2》不参评奥斯卡最佳动画长片
item.guid: 《哪吒-2》不参评奥斯卡最佳动画长片
item.description:
According to Sina Film, the Academy recently announced the "eligible for consideration" longlist for Best Animated Feature Film, totaling 35 films, but it does not include "Nezha: The Devil Boy's Sea," meaning the film will not be considered for this award. Films such as "Paddington 3" and "Smurfs: The Magical Blue" also did not appear. 据新浪电影消息，日前奥斯卡公布最佳动画长片奖「符合参评资格」大名单，共 35 部，但不包括《哪吒之魔童闹海》，即该片不会参评此奖项。《帕丁顿熊 3》《魔法蓝精灵》等影片也未出现。

Sina Film stated that if there are no special reasons, there are two scenarios for not being eligible for consideration: 新浪电影表示，不符合参评资格如无特殊原因则是两种情况：

    The distributor did not register (Nezha 2 was distributed in North America by CMC and A24);

    Did not meet the eligibility requirements (most notably, "the film must be screened for one week in New York/Los Angeles").

It's worth noting that "Nezha 2" has been widely released in North America, so it should, in theory, be eligible. Furthermore, some films on the eligible list, such as "Zootopia 2," have not yet been released, but they only need to meet the screening requirements within the deadline. 值得一提的是，《哪吒 2》已在北美广泛上映，按理说应该符合。且符合参评资格名单中的一些影片如《疯狂动物城 2》等到现在还未上映，在期限内达到上映要求即可。

item.title: 新版《呼啸山庄》电影发新海报
item.guid: 新版《呼啸山庄》电影发新海报
item.description:
Recently, a new poster for the updated "Wuthering Heights," directed by Emerald Fennell and starring Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi, was released, highlighting the theme of "thunderous love." 近日，艾默拉德 · 芬内尔执导、玛格特 · 罗比与雅各布 · 埃洛迪主演的新版《呼啸山庄》发布全新海报，突出「电闪雷鸣的爱情」主题。

The poster style continues the unified visual language of previous promotional materials, further reinforcing the film's Gothic positioning. Discussions on social platforms focus on the film's style and actor performances, with audiences anticipating an adaptation that differs from traditional BBC Classics. 海报风格延续此前宣传物料的统一视觉语言，进一步强化影片的哥特式定位。社交平台讨论集中在影片风格与演员表现，观众期待其区别于传统 BBC Classics 的改编方式。

The film, distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures, is an adaptation of Emily Brontë's novel of the same name, reinterpreting the classic romantic tragedy with a Gothic atmosphere. Its core narrative revolves around the destructive passion between Catherine Earnshaw and Heathcliff, emphasizing its lasting impact across generations. The film is set to be released in North America on February 13, 2026. 该片由华纳兄弟影业发行，改编自艾米莉 · 勃朗特的同名小说，以哥特式氛围重新诠释经典爱情悲剧。其核心叙事围绕凯茜 · 恩肖与希斯克利夫之间的毁灭性情感，强调其对几代人产生的持久影响。影片将于 2026 年 2 月 13 日在北美上映。
